label: condition
comment: A condition or status, expressed as text, for this process characteristic.
A condition or status, expressed as text, of this organization characteristic.
A condition, expressed as text, for this document status.
The condition, expressed as text, for this financial guarantee.

domainIncludes.comment: The information relevant to a condition related to a document.
An official promise or assurance to fulfil a financial obligation.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an organization.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.
